Summer Dresses
& Accessories

Go loud or go home with the stare-stealing 80s mini and power print blouse, or make it retro with vintage floral vibes and oh-so-pretty tea dresses.

It's time to hit refresh on your all-day everyday looks. Plus, score all the slammin' accessories to seal the deal. Winning.

Go Bold

From evening dos to laid-back meetups, we’ve got the dresses you need. Think standout shapes from Missguided and cute sundresses for low-key brunches, or shop for maxis that are seriously bridesmaid-worthy.

Summer Collection
From painterly florals to bold and
brilliant stripes, go big this summer.

Store Address
80 Spadina Ave, Toronto, ON M5V 2J4, Canada

Store Location
Explore and browse new and
vintage pieces in place

Lovers + Friends Polka Dot Dress
Nail your new-season fashion goals with party-prepped dresses

The Men Watch V16 is a powerful engine for the wrist. The bold chronographs confidently take their positions on the product 'grid' with their dashboard-inspired counters, which are punctuated by clearly marked digits at 12, 4 and 8 o'clock in a modern typeface, and tachymeter bezels. The Men Watch V16 models will appeal to wearers with a good dose of adrenalin in their lives and zero tolerance for missing out on the action.
